creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three large characters written horizontally across sheet; four smaller, vertical characters (signature) at far L; horizontal relief stamp URC; square intaglio stamp full of characters at LLC; square relief stamp with relatively wide border LLC
markings: URC, rectangular relief seal; LLC, square intaglio seal: 斎藤楠斎; LLC, square relief seal
title: Love of Living in Tranquility
